arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest vs Chelsea: Premier League preview, team news, kick-off time & how to watch
arts.sum: Chelsea are back in Premier League action and they face an under-pressure Ange Postecoglou and Nottingham Forest at the City Ground. Here are all of the details ahead of the Premier League fixture between Nottingham Forest and Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Chelsea handed quadruple injury boost as key players 'expected' to be fit for Forest game
arts.sum: Chelsea reportedly receive a quadruple injury boost ahead of their return to action with a Premier League fixture against Nottingham Forest on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Six players set to miss Nottingham Forest vs Chelsea as Ange Postecoglou battles to avoid sack
